title: This Month's GTA+ Membership Benefits
headline: This Month's GTA+ Membership Benefits
subtitle: This Month's GTA+ Membership Benefits
content:
In addition to the recurring monthly GTA$500,000 deposit directly into your Maze Bank account, GTA+ members who've signed up for this month (November 3 - December 12) will also receive:

- Guaranteed Panther Statue on the Cayo Perico Heist
- The Buckingham SuperVolito helicopter
- The Eclipse Tower Penthouse Suite 1 and free style changes
- Utility Vests and Bulletproof Helmets
- The Still Slipping Tie-Dye Tee and Hat
- Heist Bonuses
- And more

Visit rsg.ms/gtaplus for full details.
